description: Extracts detailed information about a mineral site from text, including site name, mineral inventory, location, and deposit type.
name: extract_mineral_site_info

location_info.description: Location information including coordinates, CRS, and region details.

country.description: The country where the mineral site is located.

crs.description: The coordinate reference system (CRS) of the location. Example: WGS 84, Mercator and so on.

location.description: The location of the mineral site in the format of POINT(latitude longitude)

state_or_province.description: The state or province where the mineral site is located.

mineral_inventory.description: List of mineral inventory items, detailing commodity, category, ore and grade metrics, and contained metal.

category.description: The category of the mineral resource or reserve.

contained_metal.description: Quantity of a contained metal in an inventory item, float.

cutoff_grade_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the cutoff grade value.

cutoff_grade_value.description: The cutoff grade value of the ore in the unit of cutoff_grade_unit.

date.description: The date of the mineral inventory in the 'dd-mm-YYYY' format.

grade_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the grade value.

grade_value.description: The grade value of the ore in the unit of grade_unit.

ore_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the ore value.

ore_value.description: The value of the ore in the unit of ore_unit.

zone.description: The zone of mineral site where inventory item was discovered

mineral_site_name.description: The name of the mineral site.
